phrases: Open your mind.

Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
Hmm...so people here on Earth are into this kind of thing, huh?
What the heck are you looking at, Urd?
Never mind, it is not for kids.
There you go.
Never mind, it is not for kids.
Thanks.
Hey, what do you mean by that?
Thanks.
Hey, what do you mean by that?
Now, now, when you are a little older, okay?
It was getting so romantic...
If only nothing had come between us...
Hey, I need some soy sauce.
Hey!
What do you think you are doing?
Um, nothing!
If you get any closer to her I am going to use a Skuld bomb on you!
Cut it out!
You would think after that day they would have made some progress...
All right, then, I am going to do it!
A mandrake root, a pumpkin ghost stem...
The tears of a banshee, and a cockatrice feather...
Mmm...it smells divine.
Now all I have to do is let it simmer for 2 hours and get the extract.
Hey, what am I doing?
Today's the last episode of Winter Storm!
Humph!
That Urd is up to no good again!
Cooking up a concoction like this...
I just know she will because another uproar.
I would better nip this evil plan in the bud!
Darn, that show really ripped.
Aha...all done, I see...
Neanderthal, Cro-Magnon, Australopithecus, Java...
Peking!
The seeds of magic, the seeds of romance...
Transform yourself into love crystals to forge a bond between those two!
Was the smoke always this overwhelming?
But hey...
Ah!
Please Do not Look at Me Like That!?
FURIN KAZAN
It is no good, at this rate, the shaft's only going to get thicker than the gear...
Damn, why did he have to give an assignment like this?
Keiichi, you should have something sweet when you are feeling tired.
Oh, thanks...huh?
Urd?!
When you are tired, you should have something sweet...there is nothing better!
Something is fishy...
I just know this is not normal candy!
Oh, hey, come on!
Of course not!
Keiichi?
I have brought you some tea.
Oh, hey, thanks.
Oh, my, what can those be?
It is candy...for people here on Earth.
Do you want some, Belldandy?
Huh?
Yes, I would love a piece!
Urd...so it really is just candy, right?
Belldandy?
It is yummy!
Urd?
What is going on?
Oh, um...nothing!
Something is wrong...did I botch it?
Me of all people?
But how can that be...
I know it did not have to be Keiichi who took those crystals, but still...
Keiichi!
Seniors...
I cannot go on anymore...
Huh?
Is it morning?
I keep having these weird dreams lately...
I guess I must be really burned out.
I am still dreaming...
Maybe I will sleep some more...
Good morning, Keiichi.
B...B...Belldandy!
Good morning, Keiichi.
B...B...Belldandy!
Please forgive me.
I woke you up, did not I?
What the heck is Belldandy doing here?
In my bed, for crying out loud?
Is this really my room, even?
Keiichi?
Is this really my room, even?
I do not know why, but you are sweating.
Were you too hot, perhaps?
I am so sorry!
But I wanted to be right next to you...
I am dreaming.
This has got to be a dream!
Keiichi?
What is the matter, Keiichi?
Keiichi!
This is terrible!
Keiichi's...
Big Sister?
Keiichi!
Big Sister!
Those Seeds of Love pack a punch.
Big Sister!
Those Seeds of Love pack a punch.
Urd, you did not use those things on Big Sister, did you?
Well, you seem to know a lot about it!
Huh?
What are you talking about?
I have no idea at all...
You come with me!
It is all right now.
Your temperature's normal.
But what on earth's making you sweat so?
I am fine, I am fine!
See?
All this exercise is making me sweat!
One, two, three, four, five, six...
Thank goodness!
There is nothing wrong with you, is there?
Keiichi?
Oh, holy...
Let me wipe away your sweat, or you will catch a cold.
I want you to hold still now, all right?
This is a dream.
It is some kind of mistake.
I have never seen Belldandy acting like this before!
It is your scent, Keiichi...
I have no idea what is going on here anymore...
Keiichi?
Yes?
Um, I have a favor to ask of you.
Sure, just hurry up and get some clothes on!
The bones of a Nauman elephant, the tears of a giant sea turtle...
Hey!
I am short on eternity dust, too!
How could you do that?
I could not let Big Sister...
How could you do that?
Mixing in that stuff was bad!
What?
Mixing in that stuff was bad!
This is going to turn Belldandy into a shameless little tramp!
Huh?!
It is all your fault for butting in like that.
Hey, I know!
The antidote... you have got to start making an antidote!
It will take 30 hours to come up with one.
That long?
The spell has a 24-hour effect, so it should wear off before...
Big Sister!
I want you to take me shopping downtown today.
Okay, sure!
I am just going to wash up first, so wait for me, okay?
Yes!
Now what is gotten into her?
Belldandy's seems so aggressive today.
I wonder if it is because I have always been too timid until now...
Keiichi?
I have come to wash your back for you.
Hold on!
I have already washed it, so you do not have to bother!
But Keiichi...are you saying you do not want me to wash your back?
No, no, I did not say that.
In that case...
Sorry!
I am getting out now, so could we do this another time?
Ugh...
I am sorry, asking you to take me shopping on such short notice.
Hey, no problem.
If you want to do something like that, it is no trouble at all!
Huh?!
Keiichi...you are so kind!
You...really think so?
Ow!
Ouch!
Oh, my!
Ow!
Ouch!
I am going on a date with Keiichi today.
Please?
Chu!
What is the matter, Banpei?
Pull yourself together, now!
I wonder what the rest of the day's going to be like?
Here we are walking around in familiar surroundings...
And just look how her eyes are glistening...
I wonder if she is trying to send some kind of message?
Keiichi?
Huh?
What is it?
Um...do you think people can tell we are a couple?
Huh?
You do not want to be with me?
No, no!
You do not want to be with me?
I never said that!
Really?
Then it is all right if we act like a couple, is not it?
This is all right, is not it?
Uh-huh!
This is all right, is not it?
All right, then.
Let us go!
Right!
Oh, no!
My Big Sister!
I have never heard Belldandy say anything like that before.
Now she is got me feeling really self-conscious!
Look at this, I bet you would look good in it.
Do you really think so?
What kind of clothes do you want to try on?
What would I try on?
If it were up to me...
Whoa...
How lovely!
Which do you think would look most becoming on me?
I would love to put something like this on, and climb into bed with you again.
No, no, no, these are not clothes, you see!
I would not look good in them?
That is not what I meant...
I would not look good in them?
Then tell me which one you like best!
Uh, then...how about that one?
It is charming!
All right, then.
I am going to go try it on.
I cannot believe my Big Sister would even look at such a vulgar outfit!
Come on!
This is no time for you to browse!
Sorry, it is so adorable...
Oh, right, you would not know anything about it.
What does that mean?
Nothing, actually...
What does that mean?
Never mind!
We have got to go after Big Sister!
Talk about a heart attack...
If she walked around dressed like that everyday, I do not think I could take it...
Not that it would be such a bad thing, of course...
Hey, what is up?
Would you mind giving me a sip of that, please?
But you have your own drink, Belldandy.
I would like to try what you are having, Keiichi.
Yeah?
Here.
Thank you.
Here.
I enjoyed it.
If I were to drink from this, would that make it a secondhand kiss?
What should I do?
There is still some left!
Are not you going to drink it?
Do not do it, Keiichi!
Bottoms up, Keiichi!
Belldandy went to the trouble of planting her lips on this.
I might never get this kind of chance again!
Who am I?
Oh...
We are so sorry.
Keiichi...
Coming to a place like this... just what are they up to?
Keiichi, this is the first time we have come to see a movie together, is not it?
I guess you are right.
I have been wanting to come here, you know...with you, Keiichi.
Oh, well, same here.
What is really going on here...why are you acting like this today, Belldandy?
I do not really understand what goes on in a girl's mind.
Hey, it is the trailer for Winter Storm.
Well, no matter how we got to this point, I am getting to see a movie...
Movie theaters are like a strange world.
The onscreen images we see in the darkness are surreal...
Sometimes it feels as if you are forced to be aware of the opposite sex.
Especially on a day like today...
Calm down!
Do you want one too, Belldandy?
This is good enough for me.
Augh!
Whoa...whoa!
This is right out of a freakin' manga!
No you do not!
Not that!
No you do not!
What is the matter?
There is something in my eye...
Would you take a look at it?
Are you all right?
What the heck...
Bizarre!
Belldandy's behavior is definitely bizarre today!
Or it is some kind of huge mistake!
You have to get closer, or...
Or it is some kind of huge mistake!
Or it is some kind of huge mistake!...you will not be able to get it out.
Come on...
But what do you want me to do?
How am I supposed to get something out of her eye?
Please hurry!
Look at that.
What do they think they are doing?
Are not they embarrassed?
You need to think about where you are before you throw those things.
Who are you to tell me what to do?
Where is Big Sister?
We did not have to run away like that.
We should not do that in front of other people.
Let us go home before something else freaky happens.
All righty...
Whoa!
I want to sit here.
I am dreaming.
I have got to be dreaming!
What a lovely ride!
Yeah.
Your back feels warm and inviting, Keiichi.
From where I am sitting, I can feel your emotions.
I would like to go somewhere far away, just you and me...
What a beautiful spot!
Listen, it is getting late...
A little longer...is it all right if I have you to myself a little longer?
All right.
Keiichi, you are so kind!
Hey!
The potion should be wearing off soon.
Too bad they cannot just go all the way first, though...
Urd!
Come on, do not just leave me behind like this!
Okay, you asked for it...
We have not spent time alone like this lately, have we?
No...
Keiichi!
Keiichi, I have to tell you...
B-B-B...Belldandy!
Keiichi, I have to tell you...
B-B-B...Belldandy!
B-B-B...Belldandy!
I love you!
Why are you so afraid?
Right...she is a goddess and I am a human.
Why is it wrong for me to get closer to you?
Belldandy will have to go back to Heaven some day.
When that day comes, will I be able to let her go?
My beloved Keiichi...all I want is to stay with you a little longer!
Right...
I am just making excuses because I am spineless!
Just like everyone says, I am being a total wimp here.
I am in love with Belldandy.
And she even says...
Keiichi!
Belldandy!
Let us go!
That is it, one more push!
Not if I can help it!
Huh, what the...
Not if I can help it!
I will not let him have Big Sister!
You think you can take me?
Then bring it on!
Keiichi!
This is inevitable, after all...
For us to want each other... it is natural...
There is no one here but us.
I want to stay in this world of ours forever...just you and me...
But...
You are not getting in their way!
Big Sister!
I do not need anything else in the world, as long as I have you.
Keiichi!
I cannot do this!
You are not yourself right now!
What?
Why not?
Is it because you do not love me?
Belldandy...
Yes?
You are an honest person, you do not have a distrustful bone in your body...
And you are so kind to everyone...
But the truth is, I want you to only be kind to me...no, wait, I mean...
Keiichi?
I do not know how to say it, but I am in love with the normal, genuine you...
I love you more when you are being yourself.
Keiichi!
I love you so much!
Belldandy!
Keiichi, I love you!
I am so pissed!
That is my Big Sister...
Good for you, Belldandy...
I am so pissed!
That is my Big Sister...
I am so pissed!
That is my Big Sister...
It is mostly thanks to my Seeds of Love...
It is mostly thanks to my Seeds of Love...
And by the way, Skuld!
You know what to expect, do not you?
Your punishment for touching my stuff without my permission...
Stop!
Stop that!
I cannot stand it!
There you go!
This device only goes around and around!
Do not show me those useless things!
Do not show me those useless things!
Deep down, those two are really close, huh?
So horribly simplistic!
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
You have a wing!
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
You have a wing!
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
Nobody else matters...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
One night, the couple finds themselves alone at last.
But it turns out to be the start of an ordeal...
